body{font-family:Arial,sans-serif;min-width:370px;padding-bottom:50px}.clearfix:after{content:"";display:table;clear:both}a[href^=tel]{color:inherit}a,a[href^=tel]{text-decoration:none}a{color:#000}.btn{background:#20b73f;border-radius:7px;color:#fff;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;outline:none;border:none;transition:background
